name: Mad Bomber Longboard
description:
Bomb away on the Mad Bomber longboard from Weirdboards. Inspired by the 100lb Aerial bombs made famous in WWII, this deck comes in 36" and 44" lengths with adjustable wheelbases to fit almost any run. Buy the deck alone, or add 180 trucks and sliders to complete it. 

Board bottom is black with screened logo, holes drilled for multiple truck fitting options, and wheel cuts to accommodate carving on the wider deck width.

Our cruisers and longboard skateboards are made from 9-, 11-, or 13-ply hardwood, hand cut and finished in the USA.

Select and add deck and wheel options to cart separately below.

name: Let the Wookie Win Longboard
description:
Words to live by. Hang it on the wall, or carve around in your bare feet and curl your toes into real Wookie fur on this Star Wars inspired longboard. Bandolier is hand painted on raised wood on this 44″ kick-tail deck. Includes 7″ Core trucks with Bigfoot wheels and Abec9 bearings for top speed and handling.

Board bottom is black with logo sticker.

Longboard skateboards are made from 9- or 11-ply Canadian Maple, pressed and cut in the USA. Each deck includes premium quality trucks, wheels and hardware.

If you have your own trucks/wheels and are just looking for a deck, please email me for special Deck Only pricing.

PS. No Wookies were harmed in the making of this board.

name: The Legsicle Supreme Longboard (FREE US SHIPPING)
description:
The Legsicle is a year round treat, that will never melt. This 44"x10" longboard is cut from sturdy 11-ply birch, with full color grip graphic on top. Buy now and get FREE SHIPPING to anywhere in the US.

Board bottom is black with logo sticker.

Our cruisers and longboard skateboards are made from 9- or 11-ply Canadian Maple, pressed and cut in the USA. Each deck includes premium quality trucks, wheels and hardware.

If you have your own trucks/wheels and are just looking for a deck, please email me for special Deck Only pricing.

name: Big Bacon Bacon 44" Longboard
description:
Show your love for bacon with the BIG Bacon Bacon 44" longboard. Nearly and inch thick, and over 10" wide. This massive slab of pork product will get you down the hill in a hurry. 

Board bottom is black with logo sticker.

Our cruisers and longboard skateboards are made from 9- or 11-ply Canadian Maple, pressed and cut in the USA. Each deck includes premium quality trucks, wheels and hardware.

If you have your own trucks/wheels and are just looking for a deck, please email me for special Deck Only pricing.

name: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot Cruiser
description:
Make mine a Whiskey, Tango Foxtrot special reserve please. This old school cruiser is 29″ long and styled after the famous Johnny Walker Black whiskey bottle design. Board bottom is black with logo sticker.

Board bottom is black with logo sticker.

Longboard skateboards are made from 9- or 11-ply Canadian Maple, pressed and cut in the USA. Each deck includes premium quality trucks, wheels and hardware.

If you have your own trucks/wheels and are just looking for a deck, please email me for special Deck Only pricing.

PS. Wookie fur is not real.

name: I Will Skate Cruiser
description:
No one is going to tell you that you can’t skate. Skating is a right. I have wheels, therefore I WILL skate. This unique original board design will tell the world just that, each time you cruise to the park or around town. 

Board bottom is black with logo sticker.

Longboard & Cruiser skateboards are made from 9- or 11-ply Canadian Maple, pressed and cut in the USA. Each deck includes premium quality trucks, wheels and hardware.

ALL CRUISERS ARE CUSTOM SKATEBOARDS THAT ARE ASSEMBLED UPON ORDER. PLEASE ALLOW TWO WEEKS FOR PROCESSING. If you have your own trucks/wheels and are just looking for a deck, please email me for special Deck Only pricing.

name: Minion Tim Cruiser
description:
Need a new ride? Ride a Minion! TIM is ready for you to hit the streets, park or wherever. 

Want a penny sized board? Don't forget to check out Dave in our shop as well. 

Skateboard is approx 27"x6"Complete with white titanium trucks and yellow cruiser wheels. Image is for illustration. Final product will be image printed on grip tape.

name: Keep Calm & Carve On Longboard
description:
Bombing the long hills or cutting an old lot. Never lose your cool on this bright red Keep Calm and Carve On deck. 

The decks I use are all sturdy 9 or 11-ply Canadian maple and are topped with full color graphics printed under the grip tape, so it maintains maximum traction. Priced as a completes, each deck includes premium quality trucks, wheels and hardware.

ALL SKATEBOARDS ARE CUSTOM SKATEBOARDS AND ASSEMBLED UPON ORDER. PLEASE ALLOW TWO WEEKS FOR PROCESSING. If you have your own trucks/wheels and are just looking for a deck, please email me for special Deck Only pricing.

name: Cojones Longboard
description:
Carving or sliding, you skate like you’ve got a pair. Now you can show it with the Cojones Mas Gigante cigar board. Styled after a Cohiba cigar, this board is just under 44″ in length, hand painted and with cigar label printed in grip tape. Board bottom is black with logo sticker.

Our longboard skateboards are made from 9- or 11-ply Canadian Maple, pressed and cut in the USA. These decks are full of pop and super sturdy. Priced as a completes, each deck includes premium quality trucks, wheels and hardware.

ALL SKATEBOARDS ARE CUSTOM SKATEBOARDS AND ASSEMBLED UPON ORDER. PLEASE ALLOW TWO WEEKS FOR PROCESSING. If you have your own trucks/wheels and are just looking for a deck, please email me for special Deck Only pricing.

name: Lightnin' Longboard
description:
Ride the light! This custom cut deck features a brilliant 38" lightning bolt with 180mm longboard trucks, premium quality wheels, bearings and hardware. 

The decks I use are all sturdy 9 or 11-ply Canadian maple and are topped with full color graphics printed under the grip tape, so it maintains maximum traction. Priced as a completes, each deck includes premium quality trucks, wheels and hardware.

ALL SKATEBOARDS ARE CUSTOM SKATEBOARDS AND ASSEMBLED UPON ORDER. PLEASE ALLOW TWO WEEKS FOR PROCESSING. If you have your own trucks/wheels and are just looking for a deck, please email me for special Deck Only pricing.

name: Minion Dave Penny Killer

Want a nickel sized board? Don't forget to check out Tim in our shop as well. 

Skateboard is approx 21"x6"Complete with white titanium trucks and yellow cruiser wheels. Image is for illustration. Final product will be image printed on grip tape.

name: Bacon Board Penny Killer
description:
The Hott Dogg custom mini cruiser skateboard. Who needs a plastic board when you can have a high quality graphic grip tape on custom cut 7-ply baltic birch board. 

Skateboard is approx 22"x5.75"Complete with white titanium trucks and red or yellow cruiser style wheels.

name: Sooper Scoop Penny Killer
